testcase.classname: Lists of screens for Users, Dieticians and clients access
testcase.name: Validating the Public section on list of screens
testcase.system-out: Given User is on public page................................................passed When User opens the browser.................................................passed Then User navigates to the public page......................................passed

testcase.classname: Lists of screens for Users, Dieticians and clients access
testcase.name: Screens avalable in the drop down menu
testcase.system-out: Given User is on home page..................................................passed When User clicks the user sign in button....................................passed Then User should be directed to the sign in page............................passed When User clicks Register link..............................................passed Then User should be redirected to the registration page.....................passed When User clicks TEAM tab...................................................passed Then It should display the page with three doctors or dieticians name and details.passed

testcase.classname: Lists of screens for Users, Dieticians and clients access
testcase.name: CLIENTS on homepage menu bar
testcase.system-out: Given User is on home page..................................................passed When User clicks clients button.............................................passed Then User should take to the clients testimonial page.......................passed When User clicks > button...................................................passed Then User should be on the second page of client testimonial................passed When User clicks the > button...............................................passed Then User should be on the last page of client testimonial..................passed

testcase.classname: Lists of screens for Users, Dieticians and clients access
testcase.name: Other screens on the menu
testcase.system-out: Given User is on sing in page...............................................passed When User clicks Forgot Password button.....................................passed Then User should be taken to the forgot password specific page..............passed When User clicks the Product feature button.................................passed Then User should be navigated to the page where product feature page........passed When User clicks Contact....................................................passed Then It should display Contact page.........................................passed When User clicks the Blogs link.............................................passed Then It should display Blogs page...........................................passed When User is on blogs page..................................................passed Then User should see blogs written onthe page...............................passed When User clicks Fearured Content...........................................passed Then It should display featured content page................................passed
